description.narrative: The Association Droits de lHomme au Quotidien (DHQ -Mali) is a non profit humanitarian local organization based in Mali. DHQ works in Bamako and has the local representations in six regions and areas. DHQ is a human right organisation while supporting the implementation of policies for the protection and promotion of human rights. The present project implemented by DHQ is named Sexual and gender violence against women particular young girl for 18 months duration. implemented in Bamako in two areasthe project contributes to promote the protection of young girls against sexual and gender violence through training, awareness-raising and advocacy. key objectives To strength the capacities of youngs leaders to provide support to sexual and gender violence survivors ( juridique and judiciary asssitance, treatement and psyhcosical support) To create synergy between communities actors for sexual and gender violence against by an awareness and amplification To allow youngs collective reflexion about sexual and gender violence and involved themselves against in your communities the innovate activities will be focus on short videos production from he survivors through social networks (Facebook and WhatsApp) for sharing and amplify promoted and popularized the legal instruments and the protective mechanisms for a community awareness organize exchange and learning activities in the community to take the floor the survivors exchange meeting between local authorities and widentheprotective setting of the girls against the VSS and the respectof the human rights. Sensitization citizen by spotlights radio to inform the populations more on the VSS and their consequences. Campaigns and sensitization against VBG/VSS throughtvarieties tools and approaches

participating-org.narrative: Association Droit de l Homme au Quotidien DHQ is a local organisation based in Mali.Our goal is to promote protect human rights, governance and active citizenship. Her missions are capacity building, identification and denunciation of human right violation, sensitization and awareness. DHQ has a local representatives in six regions of Mali and targets Civil society organizations; discriminated people and sexual violence survivants. DHQ collaborates with Umbrella human right defensers organisations and is active on national networks. #
Droit de L Homme au Quotidien
